channel.title: Nali City
channel.description: The main Nali City Forums for discussion about the site itself.

item.title: Nali City is back up!
item.author: invalid@example.com (Lightning_Hunter)
item.dc:creator: Lightning_Hunter
item.content:encoded: Nali City is back up! Oh, wait... April Fool's.

item.title: Nali City archive?
item.author: invalid@example.com (Skillz)
item.dc:creator: Skillz
item.content:encoded: What happened to the site? Going to the sub domain just redirects you to BU's main page. Is it still around? Even if users can't interact with the site (IE: uploading new maps, comments, etc..) at least let users browse the site for maps.

item.title: Where is everyone?
item.author: invalid@example.com (ChromeBallz)
item.dc:creator: ChromeBallz
item.content:encoded:
Just wondering where everyone is from back in the day.... Bot_40, Frieza, and a lot of others...

#nalicity on ETG is also empty. Illl just go idle in there in case someone comes back

item.title: Schema scheming
item.author: invalid@example.com (AMmayhem)
item.dc:creator: AMmayhem
item.content:encoded: Alright, lets quickly move the review schema to a new thread as Mass has suggested. I'll post some of the comments already posted that bring weight to the discussion. Plus I won't put them in the quote format, so it's easier to quote from, if that makes sense.

item.title: Where are the maps?
item.author: invalid@example.com ([did]madis)
item.dc:creator: [did]madis
item.content:encoded: Hey guys, I'm not sure if I'm completely retarded or whatnot, but I can't find any maps. I was planning to download a bunch of CTF maps for UT99 I loved back in the days to upgrade the map list on my Strangelove server, but now it's gone. And I also recently started mapping for UT myself and wanted to submit my work (which is getting better after a lot of practice in the last 2 months) somewhere, but now I have no idea what to do. Where are all the maps ?

item.title: OMG, is this the new site?
item.author: invalid@example.com (Lightning_Hunter)
item.dc:creator: Lightning_Hunter
item.content:encoded:
How much longer until all the links are up and working? This had better be Nali City coming back and not a trick!

I swear, if



Then I'll be mad!

item.title: Does anyone care about Nali City anymore?
item.author: invalid@example.com (tgm79)
item.dc:creator: tgm79
item.content:encoded: What's the status of the site? Is it abandoned? At least put a big sign on the front page.

item.title: Voice packs
item.author: invalid@example.com (Chew-This)
item.dc:creator: Chew-This
item.content:encoded:
Anyone familiar with using voice packs?
I see people using them all the time.
I play UT99 and would like to add some voices.
I know how to install them I believe but how do
I use them during a game?

item.title: Since NC is down...
item.author: invalid@example.com (KurtonTheMagician)
item.dc:creator: KurtonTheMagician
item.content:encoded:
Since NC is (tragically) down, does anyone know of any other sites that contain mass map-hosting and stuff like that?

Not that any of them would be better than NC, that is...

item.title: Holy Sh1t.....
item.author: invalid@example.com (digital-warrior)
item.dc:creator: digital-warrior
item.content:encoded:
Ive been away for a while but DANM the site has all but vanished....wtf???
Wish I knew of a way to get it up and running again....
This sux, because after all these years ive been here, think like 1998, I always knew I could come back to nali for a few laughs, and some awesome map downloads. Its hard to see posts from like 2 or 3 years ago at the top...
Is Nali too old school? Where has everyone gone?? Maybe we should ask Grimm back to get the boards active again.....'er maybe not, but we...

Holy Sh1t.....

item.title: Maps?
item.author: invalid@example.com (Chew-This)
item.dc:creator: Chew-This
item.content:encoded:
I'm having a difficult time finding the Map section associated to this forum?
In this section it had options for different types/styles/versions of maps.
It must have had over a 1000 different maps you could download.
Does anyone know what I'm talking about?
I use to beable to find it here:
http://nalicity.beyondunreal.com

But now the forum pops up instead.

item.title: Map uploads...
item.author: invalid@example.com (poompoom500)
item.dc:creator: poompoom500
item.content:encoded:
To Admin,

I tried uploading a couple of Assault map files using your ftp system, and I had them actually go through. My question is, what do I do now? I checked your "map" section (page) and I looked them up but didn't see my maps there.

Help.

To Admin,

Can we still submit maps to Nali City?

Pix of my maps - .

Here's the link...

Submit maps to Nali City...

item.title: Any chance of getting lost maps back?
item.author: invalid@example.com (16MentalTempest)
item.dc:creator: 16MentalTempest
item.content:encoded: I submitted a map as my old Ju.L.Mo name, which I recently changed to 16mentaltempest, called DM-GTarena. I would certainly like to get it back and make a few changes to it and resubmit it. It was first posted last year, so obviously it is now gone because of The Great Crash. Any chance of getting that back?

item.title: Catastrophe
item.author: invalid@example.com (Kantham)
item.dc:creator: Kantham
item.content:encoded:
As of the latest crash, I can not download any of the maps over Nalicity. All the downloads are non-existant
Is there a way to fix this? Or can we find the mirror over filefront?

item.title: worryingly dead
item.author: invalid@example.com (Firefly)
item.dc:creator: Firefly
item.content:encoded: i hope the crash wasn't the death knell.

item.title: What do you find most annoying in maps?
item.author: invalid@example.com (Nimbostratus)
item.dc:creator: Nimbostratus
item.content:encoded:
What's something that you've found in a map that is such a problem that, for you, ruins the map (or makes an already bad one suck more)?

The most annoying things for me are:

-Too dark. Some darkness is okay, but I'd at least like to see what keeps shooting me in the face.
-Pits of <insert toxic substance here> that you can't get out of and do low damage per second.
-Traps in main rooms/hallways.
-Things that stick out of walls and cause players to get stuck. Hard to escape Mr....

What do you find most annoying in maps?

item.title: File uploads...custom maps
item.author: invalid@example.com (poompoom500)
item.dc:creator: poompoom500
item.content:encoded:
To Whomever,

Will someone help me with submitting my map? Here's a link to my UT2K4, Mahloeeh map - Click here.

item.title: Help me find one of my old maps plz
item.author: invalid@example.com (Firefly)
item.dc:creator: Firefly
item.content:encoded:
I'm looking for TO-Carpark. It was made for TacOps and I can't find a copy anywhere.

There were two maps called that at the time. mine was the bigger of the two. It had the terr at the top with the spec ops coming in from the ground foor.

any help would be greatly appreciated.

cheers
